p: Trypanocidal activity of EO was determined using resazurin dye as previously described [ 36]. Trypanosoma b. brucei TC221 (1 × 10 4 cells/well) were incubated in complete Baltz medium with several concentrations of EO and diminazene (positive control) for 24 h at 5% CO 2 and 37 °C. Following this, cells were incubated with resazurin (10 µL) for further 24 h. The absorbance at λ of 492 and 595 nm was measured by Tecan ® plate reader and the IC 50 was calculated [ 37].
